value.title: How to run C# Notebooks with Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this episode of Azure Tips and Tricks, explore data in your Azure Cosmos DB and run experiments with C# notebooks.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks    Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azureâ€™s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure App Service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesize text input to speech, perform speech translation, and implement speaker recognition in your AI infused applications

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy a multicontainer application to Kubernetes on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

value.title: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics
value.excerpt: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics

value.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
value.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Learn how to respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then freeing these resources when activity drops.

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Putting it all together with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Putting it all together with Azure SQL

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

value.title: ExposeÂ multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
